Repeat: p1 wrapping yarn twice around needle, p2, p1 wrapping yarn twice, p1
sl 1 wyib dropping extra wrap, k2, sl 1 wyib dropping extra wrap, (k1, yo, k1, yo, k1) in next stitch
sl 1 wyif, p2, sl 1 wyif, k5
End Row: sl 1 wyif, p2, sl 1 wyif, k1

Repeat: sl 1 wyib, k2, sl 1 wyib, p5
End Row: sl 1 wyif, k2, sl 1 wyif, k1

Repeat: sl 1 wyif, p2, sl 1 wyif, k2-tog, k3-tog, pass the k2-tog stitch over the k3-tog stitch
End Row: sl 1 wyif, p2, sl 1 wyif, k1

Repeat: drop first elongated stitch off needle to front, sl 2 wib, drop next elongated stitch off needle to front; with left needle pick up the first elongated stitch, slip the same two stitches back to left needle, then pick up the second elongated stitch onto the left needle, k5
